description.sun-moon:
The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of
a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.
description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of
a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of
a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.
description.sword-shield:
The user shoots powerful lasers using the power of
a prism. The user can’t move on the next turn.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  User loses its next turn to "recharge", and cannot attack or switch out during that turn.
effect.shortEffect: User foregoes its next turn to recharge.
